title: Falcon 2200LB Electric Hydraulic Lift Table for Motorcycles/trikes/ATV/UTV
body_html:
All Motorcycles/Trikes/ATVs/UTVs/Snowmobiles Lift Tables.

  • Two Year Warranty; 2200LB Heavy Duty

  • Perfect for motorcycles, trikes, ATVs, UTVs, snowmobiles, lawn mowers, and golf carts - for all your maintenance needs.

  • Stable Scissor Frame with Precise Pivot Shafts and Thicker Gauge Steel

  • 110V 60HZ Single Phase Motor

  • Quick, Precise, and Quiet Operation

  • Front Extension Included (Extend table to 102.5" Length)

  • MT2200X model with XLT Side Extensions Included (Extend table to 61" Width)

Falcon 2200LB heavy duty Electric Hydraulic lift table is one of the most professionally made lift tables. It includes a main table, sides (for MT2200X model with 61" wide table), a front wheel clamping vise, a front extension, a drop out tail, and three 26" long drive-on approach ramp. It is built with quality materials and excellent workmanship. Every part is fully tested. The lift table is comparable to those known high-end lift tables.

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $150 Discount): Chicago (IL) and Las Vegas (NV)

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications

Installation Manual

  • Adjustable Table Lengths: 86 5/8" - 102 3/8"
  • Weight Capacity: 2,200 LB
  • Table Length with Approach Ramp: 128"
  • Table Length without Approach Ramp: 102 3/8"
  • Drop Out Tail Dimensions: 20" x 20"
  • Removable Approach Ramps: 26"L x 12"W
  • Distance Between Ramps: 10"
  • Table Width without Extensions (MT2200 Model): 28"
  • Table Width with Extensions (MT2200X Model): 61"
  • Table Steel Thickness: 1/8"
  • Safety Locking Positions (to table top): 6 5/16" to 47 1/4"
  • Maximum Lifting Height (to table top): 47 1/4"
  • Lowered Height (to table top): 6 5/16"
  • Side Extension Size (2 Pieces): 86 5/8"L x 16 1/2"W
  • Floor Plate Size: 69"L x 22"W
  • Electrical Requirements: 110V, 60HZ, Single Phase
  • Hydraulic Oil: 1.6 gallons AW32/AW46 (not included)
  • Shipping Weight: 600LB (lift table), 150LB (power unit), 300LB (side extensions for MT2200X model)
  • Shipping Dimension: 91"L x 30"W x 15"H (lift table), 59"L x 18"W x 19"H (power unit), 92"L x 17"W x 11"H (side extensions for MT2200X model)

Features

  • Front extension. Front chopper extension allows long bikes to fit onto the lift.
  • Automatic safety locking system. Secures lift in place while operating.
  • Wide Side Extensions. Makes lift table 61" wide (MT2200X model).
  • Detachable drive on ramp. Low angle ramp protects bikes as they are rolled onto and off of the lift.
  • Drop out tail. Allows access to rear of vehicles and makes wheel service easier.
  • Enhanced rack under main table. 7 position safety locking system: secures lift in place while working.
  • Front wheel vise. Secures vehicles.
  • Greasable shaft. Grease zerks on axle maintains smooth rolling action.
  • Movable Power unit station. 110V, 60HZ, Single Phase

All Motorcycles/Trikes/ATVs/UTVs/Snowmobiles Lift Tables.
